QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.visit_detail_id , t.person_id , t.visit_detail_concept_id , t.visit_detail_start_date , t.visit_detail_start_datetime , t.visit_detail_end_date , t.visit_detail_end_datetime , t.visit_detail_type_concept_id , t.provider_id , t.care_site_id , t.admitted_from_concept_id , t.discharged_to_concept_id , t.preceding_visit_detail_id , t.visit_detail_source_value , t.visit_detail_source_concept_id , t.admitted_from_source_value , t.discharged_to_source_value , t.parent_visit_detail_id , t.visit_occurrence_id FROM {sc}.visit_detail t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by 2
